mention.text: 19 mar 89 -- we have just confirmed that dutch reporter cornell lagrow of a dutch television station was killed this morning as he was covering a skirmish in the town of san francisco javier , usulutan department
san francisco javier , usulutan department , where there has been heavy fighting between the guerrillas of the farabundo marti liberation and the army
